ALL TRANSACTION NEWS
Sunday, 7/30/2025
Tuesday 1/31/2025 :
P David Blade was promoted from AAA Quebec to the active roster.

Thursday 2/9/2025 :
Free agent RF Patricio Garza has been signed to a contract of $10,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
Free agent 1B Osvaldo Torre has been signed to a contract of $2,000,000 per year, for 1 years.
Patricio Garza was assigned to the active roster.
Osvaldo Torre was assigned to the active roster.
Friday 2/17/2025 :
